changeSet.comment: for already exist practiceResults calculagte the time of the practice base on the time of all its related questions
changeSet.sql: UPDATE practice_result pr, (SELECT qr.PRACTICE_RESULT_ID as pr_id, sum(qr.QUESTION_TIME_SECOND) as timeSum from question_result qr, practice_result pr1 where qr.PRACTICE_RESULT_ID=pr1.ID GROUP BY qr.PRACTICE_RESULT_ID) totalTime SET pr.TIME_SECOND = totalTime.timeSum WHERE pr.ID=totalTime.pr_id;
